name: Quiver (itch) (RisingThumb)
description:
You are one of the nation's Top US Marines in the midst of the Cold War, stationed by the Bermuda Triangle to protect top secret Teleportation research by the nations best and brightest Nuclear and Quantum Physicists. In testing the teleportation of a Nuclear Bomb, something goes horrendously wrong scrambling the Base's structure and unleashing a portal straight to Gehennom! Zombies, Demons and Cyberdemons are pouring forth. It's time to switch off the safety, and it's time for A BLOODBATH!

A browser version is available: Play it here. Not recommended compared to the executable as the graphical quality is reduced, and the multiplayer functionality does not work in the browser.

Features
  • Generated levels using a premade mixture of hand-crafted rooms
  • A variety of distinct and powerful weapons
  • Multiplayer Networking to play deathmatches
  • A variety of distinct and powerful enemies
  • Full support for Windows, Mac OS and Linux platforms
